channel.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
channel.description:
I am looking for someone to play the part of alyx in my machinima "The Bivium". This machinima will take place between half-life 1 and half-life 2 + episodes...and will cover the seven hour war. I also need people to play female rebels.
email me at: [email]sirpownageorav3nger@gmail.com[/email] or PM me and I will add you to steam.

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
This sounds really exciting! I am truly looking forward to this project.

Read full topic
item.source: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Dias:

I want to know why they have new vests to begin with.

I almost feel like telling actually. It may be explained in the movie…but It should almost be obvious.

Double post… sh–

We also need sound artists, and Pro mapping is a great plus. If you are a texture artist and are interested, PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel

item.description:
The Minotaur:

You could try CatzEyez I suppose, couldn’t hurt to ask. She IS a voice actor afterall.

Yeah, I tried her. I don’t know, she couldn’t help.

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
Dias:

I want to know why they have new vests to begin with.

I think that av3nger won’t tell us. It’s a great way to create expectation around a project, no telling anything about it (just look at Cloverfield or EP3).

Now… if we could have an ARG…

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Zerego:

A HL2 machinima all about beavers. I’d watch that.

It’s a latin word…goto school?

It means, The crossing of two paths.

My sig was big because I was experimenting with its size ratios. It was an inactive time for the forum anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: The Bivium-Be Alyx or female rebel
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
The title sounds stupid tbh.

Does it involve beavers?

Actually, that would be kinda cool.

edit:

Bivium
Biv"i*um, n. [L., a place with two ways. See Bivious.] (Zo["o]l.) One side of an echinoderm, including a pair of ambulacra, in distinction from the opposite side (trivium), which includes three ambulacra.

O_o

Read full topic
